com.persistit
Class Management.TransactionInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.persistit.Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
      com.persistit.Management.TransactionInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing interface:
Management
public static class Management.TransactionInfo
extends Management.AcquisitionTimeBase

A structure that holds counts of commit, rollbacks and rollbacks since the last commit. Roll-backs since last commit is computed by adding the rollbacks since last commit of each Transaction whose session owned Thread that is still alive. Therefore the statistics include Transaction contexts that may not have executed a transaction recently.

See Also:
Serialized Form
